property.name: problem.summary
property.value: Some static methods in `com.liferay.portal.kernel.servlet.SanitizedServletResponse` have been removed because these relate to the X-Xss-Protection header which is not supported by modern browsers

property.name: problem.title
property.value: Remove some static methods in com.liferay.portal.kernel.servlet.SanitizedServletResponse and Portal Property http.header.secure.x.xss.protection
